tool_description: Our API provides the easiest and most comprehensive data on Covid-19 driven travel restrictions. Gain access to tailored travel restrictions based on passport, departure, destination and vaccination
name: Travel Restrictions - Canitravelnet
title: Travel Restrictions - Canitravelnet

api_list.name: Get all supported countries
api_list.description:
Get the latest list of countries that we provide travel restrictions.

The Response is in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-restrictions-canitravelnet.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/countries/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-restrictions-canitravelnet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-restrictions-canitravelnet.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/countries/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-restrictions-canitravelnet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get travel restrictions for a single country
api_list.description:
Get the latest personalised travel restrictions for a country based on departure, passport and vaccination.

The Response is in JSON format.

required_parameters.name: passport
required_parameters.description: Optional: 2 letter ISO country code that represents the passport country

required_parameters.name: vaccinated
required_parameters.description: Boolean value: either True or False. By default set to false, true if the traveler has been vaccinated

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: Optional: 2 letter ISO country code that represents the from country
